articles.content:
Guinean Party Delegation Visits DPRK Embassy 
    Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea headed by its General Secretary Sekou Konate visited the DPRK embassy in Conakry on July 8 on the occasion of the 11th anniversary of President  Kim Il Sung's demise. It comprised members of its Political Bureau.
  The delegation laid a basket of flowers in the name of the Political Bureau of the party before the full-length portrait of the President in the embassy before paying homage to him.    
ï¿½@Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were words "We pay high tribute to HE Kim Il Sung".

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Delegation 
    Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of the National Radio, Film and Television Agency of China on a visit to the DPRK. 
 It was handed to Jong Ha Chol, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Lei Yuanliang, deputy director general of the agency who is heading the delegation, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Greetings to Kyrgyz President
Kim Yong Nam Meets Special Envoy of Chinese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kyrgyz President
    Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to  Kurmanbek Bakiyev upon his election as president of Kyrgyzstan. 
 Expressing the belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop favorably, the message wished the president a great success in his responsible work for the country's political stability, social unity and people's wellbeing.

articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets EP Delegation
    Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with the delegation of the European Parliament led by Ursula Stenzel, chairperson of the Sub-Committee for the Korean Peninsula of the parliament, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
 On hand were Deputy to the SPA Ri Jong Hyok, chairman of the Korea-West Europe Friendship Parliamentary Group, and officials concerned.
